login_backup_text.line1: The Easy5050 DApp is built on the Peerplays decentralized blockchain, so nobody else can access your account without your permission. This means you must keep your own backup recovery file.
login_backup_text.line2: If you forget your password or if your computer crashes, the only way to regain access to your account is with your backup file.

sign_up.note1: If you lose your password, you will lose all of your funds!
sign_up.note3: To download a text file of your password, click the link below:
sign_up.pseudoText1: I understand that Easy5050 cannot recover lost passwords
sign_up.pseudoText2: I have securely saved my generated password
sign_up.already_have_account: Already have an account? Go to %(login_link)s
sign_up.account_name_text: First, you'll need to choose a unique account name. Your account name can be between 3-63 characters in length. Once you've selected an available username, click Continue
sign_up.password_info_text:
This is your Private Key for the PeerPlays Network. Like a password, a Private Key protects your account, ensuring that only you have access, however it is much more secure. A private key is never sent or stored anywhere, and it is nearly impossible to reproduce. Our staff will never ask for your Private Key and you should keep it safe like a credit card number or bank account number.

This is the only time you will ever be shown your Private Key. If you lose your Private Key, you will forfeit all funds and access to your account. We strongly suggest storing this information securely and saving it in multiple locations. We ask that you copy the Private Key into the empty field to indicate that you have safely and securely recorded it elsewhere.

Once you have finished and indicated you understand, click "Create Account" to finish.
sign_up.beta-message: This is where you can try out the exciting new 5050 DApp which uses SWEEPS on the Peerplays Blockchain. There's no real money here - it's just for fun to show what it can do. We'll give you some BitFun to get started. Go ahead and create draws and play them on us!
sign_up.step1-message: Please review the terms and conditions, when you are done click on the accept button to continue.
sign_up.step2-message1: Please, select a username for you to use whenever you access Easy5050
sign_up.step2-bullet4: Must contain either a number or dash, or have no vowels (A, E, I, O, U, Y)
sign_up.step3-message1: We generate your password for you.
sign_up.step3-message2: You can use the "COPY" button to re-enter the passowrd in the space provided.
sign_up.step4-message1: We cannot stress enough how important it is for you to put your password in a safe place.
sign_up.step4-message2: It is IMPOSSIBLE to retrieve a lost password. If you lose your password, all funds in your account will also be lost.

login_bts.title: PEERPLAYS UIA and BTS Sharedrop Balance Claims
login_bts.note_1: If you held PEERPLAYS UIA tokens in your BitShares wallet on or after 4:00 UTC on December 26, 2016, enter your BitShares private owner key below to claim your PPY balance.
login_bts.note_2: If you held BTS tokens in your BitShares wallet on September 2, 2016 at 16:37 UTC (BitShares block number 9,291,600), enter your BitShares private owner key below to claim your PPY balance.
login_bts.note_3: For all other PPY token redemptions, please "sign up" below, and then go to settings/balance claims and enter your redemption key.

terms_conditions.participate_note_1: In using the Easy5050 DApp to participate in the lottery (the "Permitted Lottery") conducted by the charitable or religious organization (the "Organization") pursuant to a license to conduct such Permitted Lottery (the "License"), a participant ("Participant") acknowledges and confirms its full understanding and acceptance of the terms and conditions contained within these Terms and Conditions (as amended from time to time), and the Participant’s unconditional agreement to be legally bound by them.
terms_conditions.participate_note_2: In using the Easy5050 DApp in Canada, the Participant acknowledges and agrees and is deemed to have represented to <Organization> that he/she
terms_conditions.participate_bullet_1: has reviewed the terms and conditions of the Permitted Lottery,
terms_conditions.participate_bullet_2: is legally of the age of majority in the jurisdiction in which the Permitted Lottery is being offered (the "Jurisdiction") and
terms_conditions.participate_bullet_3: is eligible to participate, or not otherwise prohibited from participating, in the Permitted Lottery under the laws applicable in the Jurisdiction ("Applicable Laws") and the terms of the License.
terms_conditions.participate_note_3: <Organization> confirms its reliance on the deemed representations of the Participant, without independent verification, and bears no risk or responsibility for the Participant’s compliance with Applicable Laws or the License in its use of the Easy5050 DApp or its participation in the Permitted Lottery.
terms_conditions.participate_note_4: In using the Easy5050 DApp outside of Canada, the Participant acknowledges and agrees and is deemed to have represented to <Organization> that such use is in accordance with and does not violate or otherwise breach any applicable laws and <Organization> is relying on the deemed representations of the Participant, without independent verification, and bears no risk or responsibility for the Participant’s compliance with any applicable laws in using the Easy5050 DApp.
terms_conditions.create_note_1: In using the Easy5050 DApp, a user ("User") acknowledges and confirms its full understanding and acceptance of the terms and conditions contained within these Terms and Conditions, (as amended from time to time), and the User’s unconditional agreement to be legally bound by them.
terms_conditions.create_note_2: In using the Easy5050 DApp in Canada, the User acknowledges and agrees and is deemed to have represented to <Organization> that:
terms_conditions.create_note_3: <Organization> confirms its reliance on the deemed representations of the User, without independent verification, and bear no risk or responsibility for the User’s compliance with Applicable Laws or the License in the conduct, management and operation of the Permitted Lottery or the use of the Easy5050 DApp.
terms_conditions.create_note_4: In using the Easy5050 DApp outside of Canada, the User acknowledges and agrees and is deemed to have represented to <Organization> that such use is in accordance with and does not violate or otherwise breach any applicable laws and <Organization> is relying on the deemed representations of the User, without independent verification, and bears no risk or responsibility for the User’s compliance with any applicable laws in using the Easy5050 DApp.
terms_conditions.create_bullet_1: it is a "charitable or religious organization" as that term is defined under the laws applicable in the jurisdiction  ("Applicable Laws") where the User carries on its charitable or religious objects and in which the Easy5050 DApp is to be used (the "Jurisdiction");
terms_conditions.create_bullet_2: it has been issued a valid license by the Lieutenant Governor in Council of the Jurisdiction or by such other person or authority in the Jurisdiction as specified by the Governor in Council in that Jurisdiction or otherwise under the Applicable Laws (the "License");
terms_conditions.create_bullet_3: the License authorizes the User to conduct and manage a "lottery scheme" or  game of chance as those terms are defined under Applicable Laws (a "Permitted Lottery");
terms_conditions.create_bullet_4: the use of the Easy5050 DApp will not violate Applicable Laws or the terms and conditions  of the License;
terms_conditions.create_bullet_5: the License is in good standing and the User is in compliance with all of its terms and conditions;
terms_conditions.create_bullet_6: the proceeds from the Permitted Lottery shall be used for a "charitable or religious object or purpose" as defined by Applicable Laws to the extent required under Applicable Laws;
terms_conditions.create_bullet_7: the Permitted Lottery will be offered only in the Jurisdiction, in accordance with the terms of the License and Applicable Laws, to those who are:
terms_conditions.create_sbullet_1: legally of the age of majority in the Jurisdiction and
terms_conditions.create_sbullet_2: eligible to participate, or not otherwise prohibited from participating, under Applicable Laws and the terms of the License.
